member.name: D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE
member.summary: Defines how the world transform, dots per inch (dpi), and stroke width affect the shape of the pen used to stroke a primitive.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE.D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE_NORMAL
member.summary: The stroke respects the currently set world transform, the dpi, and the stroke width.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE.D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE_FIXED
member.summary: The stroke does not respect the world transform but it does respect the dpi and stroke width.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE.D2D1_STROKE_TRANSFORM_TYPE_HAIRLINE
member.summary: The stroke is forced to 1 pixel wide (in device space) and does not respect the world transform, the dpi, or the stroke width.
